description: Windows Exporter Dashboard forked from Ismaeil Rasoulivand

targets.expr: (sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) * 100
sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_info{} * on(container_id) group_left avg by (container_id) (windows_container_memory_usage_private_working_set_bytes{instance="$server"}))
sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_info * on(container_id) group_left avg by (container_id) (rate(windows_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$server"}[2m])) * 10)

title: Windows Exporter Dashboard
